scripts.test:e2e: start-server-and-test 'cd .. && npm start' http://localhost:3000 'cypress run --e2e --config-file cypress.config.ts'
scripts.test:e2e:open: start-server-and-test 'cd .. && npm start' http://localhost:3000 'cypress open --e2e --config-file cypress.config.ts'
scripts.test:performance: start-server-and-test 'cd .. && npm start' http://localhost:3000 'cypress run --e2e --spec "e2e/sheet.performance.cy.ts" --config-file cypress.config.ts'
scripts.test:stress: start-server-and-test 'cd .. && npm start' http://localhost:3000 'cypress run --e2e --spec "e2e/sheet.stress.cy.ts" --config-file cypress.config.ts'
scripts.test:performance:baseline: start-server-and-test 'cd .. && npm start' http://localhost:3000 'node scripts/fetch-baseline.js && cypress run --e2e --spec "e2e/sheet.performance.cy.ts" --config-file cypress.config.ts'
